1.18.2.2.0.0a2.0: added config system, added speed modifiers for ships based on different factors, added ability to set sail state with forward/backward keybinds, added the galley, added crafting recipes, added knockback and damage feature for ships, added ability to leash ships and boats, added ability to zoom out while in a ship, rework for cannon mechanics, various fixes.
1.18.2.2.0.0a2.1: fixed speed log spamming, fixed crafting recipes, fixed incorrect sail state sound playing, fixed toggle sail key issues.
1.18.2.2.0.0a2.2: added paddling modifier, fixed immersive portals and oh the biomes you'll go incompatibility, adjusted passenger positions for all ships, fixed sail sound firing twice.
1.18.2.2.0.0a2.3: added client side config, added auto third person feature when entering ships, added config updating system, fixed arclight incompatibility, fixed wrong sail sound being played.

1.19.2.2.0.0a2.0: various fixes, added config system,  rework cannon mechanics. added the galley, added leashing, added new sail control.
1.19.2.2.0.0a2.1: fixed sail-key issues, fixed crafting recipes, fixed speed log spamming.
1.19.2.2.0.0a2.2: added paddling modifier, fixed immersive portals and oh the biomes you'll go incompatibility, adjusted passenger positions for all ships, fixed sail sound firing twice.
1.19.2.2.0.0a2.3: added client side config, added auto third person feature when entering ships, added config updating system, fixed wrong sail sound being played.
